meanings.definition: Consisting of or resembling twittering sounds.
meanings.sent1: The twittery birds chirped happily in the morning.
meanings.sent2: The forest was filled with the twittery sounds of birds singing.
meanings.sent3: The twittery birds seemed to be having a conversation with each other.
meanings.sent4: The twittery melody of the song filled the room with joy.
meanings.sent5: The twittery notes of the flute danced in the air.

meanings.sent1: She felt twittery before her big presentation.
meanings.sent2: The children were twittery with anticipation on Christmas morning.
meanings.sent3: His twittery behavior made everyone around him anxious.
meanings.sent4: The twittery energy in the room was contagious.
meanings.sent5: The twittery atmosphere at the concert was electrifying.

meanings.definition: To make a series of high-pitched sounds.
meanings.sent1: The birds twittery in the trees outside my window.
meanings.sent2: I could hear the crickets twittery in the grass at night.
meanings.sent3: The kittens began to twittery as they played with a ball of yarn.
meanings.sent4: The wind made the leaves twittery as it rustled through the trees.
meanings.sent5: The children's laughter twittery as they played in the park.
